com.kingcore.framework.jdbc
类 ConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  com.kingcore.framework.jdbc.ConnectionManager
所有已实现的接口：
DataSourceManager, javax.sql.DataSource
public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.sql.DataSource, DataSourceManager

          release connection object to pool.

          get Connection by name.

protected  javax.sql.DataSource getDataSource()
          by Zeven below is implements of DataSourceProvider.

          get DataSource by dataSourceName.

          获取defaultDataSourceName.
static ConnectionManager getInstance()
          Zeven: use singleton design model,just like static object or method.

          by Zeven below implements of DataSource.

方法详细信息

getInstance

public static ConnectionManager getInstance()
Zeven: use singleton design model,just like static object or method.

返回：

getConnection

public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
get connection by default name. default DataSource Pool Name is "jndi/jdbc", it is same to default JNDI name.

指定者：
接口 DataSourceManager 中的 getConnection
指定者：
接口 javax.sql.DataSource 中的 getConnection
抛出：
java.sql.SQLException

release

public void release()

系统停止使用后，释放所有连接池的连接对象。

WZW on 2005-10-29 增加对多个连接池管理的消除功能
